T-Shape Profile Definition
==========================



```
concept {
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:Depth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:FlangeWidth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:WebThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:FlangeThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:FilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:FlangeEdgeRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:WebEdgeRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:WebSlope -> IfcPlaneAngleMeasure
    IfcTShapeProfileDef:FlangeSlope -> IfcPlaneAngleMeasure
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
}
```
